ChIP-seq: Arrigoni, L. et al. (2015). Standardizing chromatin research: a simple and universal method for ChIP-seq. Nucleic Acids Res. gkv1495.
Duty Cycle: 5 , Peak Incident Power: 140 , Cycles per Burst: 200 , Processing Time: 12 min

Auto Histone ChIP Kit (Diagenode). Indirect method: ChIP_IPure_200. 13 hrs antibody incubation, 4 hrs beads incubation, 5 min washes. Decrosslink + RNase/Proteinase K treatment 30 min 37 degrees + 4 hrs 65 degrees. Purification with Qiagen MinElute kit.
NEBNext Universal PCR Primer for Illumina (NEB, E7335); 5'-AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGATCTACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGCTCTTCCGATC*T-3'
NEBNext Index 1 Primer for Illumina (NEB, E7335); 5´-CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCGTGATGTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATC-s-T-3´
not given in the protocol (1µl of universal and 1 µl of index primer per 50 µl PCR reaction)
Initial Denaturation: 98°C for 30 sec; 10 cycles: 98°C for 10 sec, 65°C for 30 sec, 72°C for 30 sec; Final extension: 72°C for 5 min; Hold at 4°C
Prior to PCR not meassured, Starting amount for library preparation: < 2.5 ng fragmented IP DNA
Agencourt AMPure XP Beads (Beckman Coulter, A63881)
Fragment size distribution from 200 bp to 2000 bp, Peak fragment size: 350 bp
multiplex paired end (2x53 bp, 7 bp Index)
TruSeq PE Cluster Kit v3 - cBot - HS
